oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis of Azoaromatic Dyes via Redox Driven C-N Bond Fusion
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINAN, M
PANDA, M
BANERJEE, P
SHINISHA, CB
SUNOJ, RB
GOSWAMI, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: radical cations
azo-compounds
complexes
oxidation
bis(hydrazine)
chromophores
reduction
ruthenium
density
polymer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two novel organic azo-dyes (2(+)) that feature an intense intramolecular charge transfer transition with end absorption reaching into the NIR region are Introduced. Syntheses of these compounds were achieved by an unusual redox-driven C-N bond fusion of the tricyclo azo-aromatic compounds (1(+)). The compounds show reversible electro- as well as proton chromism. The results have generated further scope of research in the area of designed syntheses of functional azoaromatics,
